definition[0]: the 12th letter of the English alphabet
definition[1]: the number 50 in the system of roman numerals
definition[2]: the written abbreviation of  large, used on clothes to show the size
definition[3]: the written abbreviation of  lake, used on maps
definition[4]: the written abbreviation of  learner, used on cars to show that the driver is a learner
definition[5]: the written abbreviation of  litre or  litres
